Prose Bootstrap
Introducing Prose Bootstrap
Prose Bootstrap is a minimal template intended to get you started with Jekyll.
Posted by Michael Aufreiter on June 18, 2012

In order to get started with Prose Bootstrap, all you have to do is forking the repository and make your own adjustments.

Adjust Configuration

Make sure you setup _config.yml correctly.

If your page lives under http://username.github.com/sitename your config.yml looks like this:

auto: true
server: true
permalink: none
baseurl: "sitename"
exclude:
- .gitignore
- README.md

Use Prose

Once your site is up you can start managing it with Prose. Follow the instructions here.

Made by Development Seed, Source Code on GitHub
